Author: mynameishere
Content:
meeting people, going places, doing work, and through unavoidable suffering

Rather odd summary of the holocaust experience. I'm really not sure if it's a good model for web design though.

Author: ashu
Content: Look at what Pandora has done. I think each of their ads looks phenomenal. I sometimes keep staring (and end up clicking!) at  the ads just because they are so beautifully integrated with the site.

Author: acgourley
Content: I don't think thats the case everywhere though.
